description.translate: Carry us by your voice and only the initiated will recognize you, Tarja.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Vœu nocturne\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Porte-nous par ta voix et seuls les\"}","{\"text\":\"§7initiés sauront te reconnaître, Tarja.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Carry us by your voice and only\"}","{\"text\":\"§7the initiated will recognize you, Tarja.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7RES§a1 §7HER§a1 §7DAR§a1\"}"]}}
